description: Enable seamless interaction with Hacker News directly from Claude Desktop. Browse latest, top, and best stories, view detailed story information, and read comments with clean formatting for enhanced readability. Access Hacker News content effortlessly using natural language or commands.

capabilities.name: hn_latest
capabilities.description: Get the latest/newest stories from Hacker News

capabilities.name: hn_top
capabilities.description: Get the top-ranked stories from Hacker News

capabilities.name: hn_best
capabilities.description: Get the best stories from Hacker News

capabilities.name: hn_story
capabilities.description: Get details for a specific story by ID

capabilities.name: hn_comments
capabilities.description: Get comments for a story (by story ID or index from last story list)
